entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Rock River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:31 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -32.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Rock River 8:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -32.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -53
Dewpoint: -35.9°C
Wind: ENE 52 km/h gust 63 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 32 except low minus 45 near the Ogilvie mountains.
entry.summary: Clear. Blizzard near the Richardson mountains. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Local blowing snow this evening and overnight. Ice fog patches. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 gusting to 90 near the Richardson mountains. Temperature steady near minus 32 except low minus 45 near the Ogilvie mountains. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 32 except high minus 35 near the Ogilvie mountains.
